Verses: 1 aa, Umadhu Naamaththai Saththurukkalukkuth Theriyappannuvadharkum, Jaadhigal Ummudaiya Sannidhikku Mun Thaththalippadharkum,
2 dhevareer Vaanangalaik Kizhiththirangi, Urukkum Akkini Eriyumaappolavum, Akkini Thanneeraip Pongappannumaappolavum, Parvadhangal Umakkumunbaaga Urugumpadi Seyyum.
3 naangal Edhirpaarththiraadha Bayangaramaana Kaariyangalai Neer Seydhapodhu, Neer Irangineer, Umadhu Sannidhiyil Parvadhangal Urugippoyina.
4 dhevane, Umakkuk Kaaththirukkiravargalukku Neer Seybavaigalai, Neereyallaamal Ulagaththotrammudharkondu Oruvarum Kettadhumillai, Seviyaal Unarndhadhumillai, Avaigalaik Kandadhumillai.

5 magizhchchiyaai Needhiyai Seygiravargalaiyum, Ummudaiya Vazhigalil Ummai Ninaikkiravargalaiyum Sandhikkireer; Naangalo, Avaigalukku Virodhamaaga Eppozhudhum Paavancheydhapadiyinaale, Dhevareer Kadunkobankondeer; Innamum Thappiyirukkirom.

6 naangal Anaivarum Theettaanavargalpola Irukkirom; Engaludaiya Needhigalellaam Azhukkaana Kandhaipola Irukkiradhu, Naangal Anaivarum Ilaigalaippol Udhirugirom; Engal Akkiramangal Kaatraippol Engalai Adiththukkondupogiradhu.

7 umadhu Naamaththai Nokkik Kooppidugiravanum, Ummaip Patrikkollumpadikku Vizhiththukkollugiravanum Illai; Dhevareer Ummudaiya Mugaththai Engalai Vittu Maraiththu, Engal Akkiramangalinimiththam Engalaik Karaiyappannugireer.
8 ippozhudhum Karththaave, Neer Engaludaiya Pidhaa, Naangal Kaliman; Neer Engalai Uruvaakkugiravar, Naangal Anaivarum Umadhu Karaththin Kiriyai.
9 karththaave, Adhigamaaik Kadunkobankollaamalum, Endraikkum Akkiramaththai Ninaiththukkollaamalum Iruppeeraaga; Idho, Paarum, Naangal Anaivarum Ummudaiya Janangale.
10 umadhu Parisuththa Pattanangal Vanaandharamaayina; Seeyon Vanaandharamaayitru; Erusalem Paazhaaikkidakkiradhu.
11 engal Pidhaakkal Ummaith Thudhiththa Parisuththamum Magimaiyumaana Engaludaiya Aalayam Akkinikku Iraiyaagi, Inbamaana Engaludaiya Sthaanangalellaam Paazhaayina.
12 karththaave, Ivaigal Ippadiyirundhum Adakkikkondiruppeero? Mavunamaayirundhu, Adhigamaai Engalai Sirumaippaduththuveero?
